attributes.action: allow council tenants to be given properties with a room for each child regardless if they are the same sex, eg; 2 boys= seperate rooms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am starting this petition as I am in temp accomadation, I have two sons, one of nine years and one of six years, my nine year old has started to get homework and needs his own space to this, my six year old often interfears with his work ect.
The rooms that a single parent family are given are of small size, and the older children get frustrated when trying to work, they need their own creative space. And as we are then permantly housed, when the eldest child reaches secondary school age (11) the youngest will be of eight years. How is the older child expected to concentrate when sharing a room with an eight year old.. cramped conditions for growing brains cant be good?
